about.title: Explore Bitcoin like a true pioneer, with complete freedom
titles: Explore Bitcoin like a true pioneer, with complete freedom
Security guaranteed on the digital frontier
The freedom to explore, the security of a base
paragraphs: At Strategy Mars, we believe that financial freedom should be as vast as space. We offer a P2P (peer-to-peer) platform where you can trade Bitcoin directly, without bureaucratic identity verification processes (KYC). Here, your privacy and autonomy are respected in every transaction, like a true space explorer.

Just as Mars pioneers would need privacy in their communications, we understand that each person has the right to manage their financial resources without interference. By choosing Strategy Mars, you're choosing a platform where your identity remains yours. Our model operates based on trust between explorers, creating an environment where everyone can trade securely without giving up their privacy.

Even without requiring KYC, our security is as robust as a Martian bunker. Our platform offers an advanced verification and monitoring system, ensuring that all transactions are legitimate and secure. Each seller is responsible for the quality of the Bitcoin traded, and our team is always ready to resolve any issues, ensuring that everyone fulfills their responsibilities as colony members.

Forget the delays of interplanetary communications. At Strategy Mars, transactions happen at the speed of light, simply and transparently. Without intermediaries, you negotiate directly with other explorers, maintaining the necessary security to ensure everything goes smoothly.

Like a good command base, our support team is always available to solve problems, mediate disputes, and ensure that your buying and selling experience is smooth. If something doesn't go as planned, our conflict resolution structure is ready to act and protect the interests of our digital colonists.

With Strategy Mars, you have the opportunity to join a community that values financial freedom and privacy as much as security. We believe in a fairer market where trust is the foundation of all operations. Join us and experience true freedom when trading Bitcoin, as an authentic explorer of new financial worlds.

fees.reflectionTitle: Reflection: Bitcoin as a Libertarian Tool
fees.reflection1: If Bitcoin is truly a libertarian tool, why do governments still allow people to legally buy BTC?
fees.reflection2: The answer is in control: to acquire BTC through traditional exchanges, you need to provide all your personal data (KYC). Thus, the government tracks where your Bitcoin is and who owns it.
fees.reflection3: The real cost is not just in the transaction fee, but at the time of withdrawal. Besides the fixed fee, your transactions are exposed to government control, with taxes of up to 27.5% depending on your location.
fees.reflection4: The 'convenience' of traditional exchanges can cost your financial privacy. By handing over your personal data, you never know how they might be used in the future.
fees.privacy1: At Strategy Mars, your privacy is protected as a valuable resource.
fees.privacy2: Start trading from 200 BRL using Liquid, onchain, and Lightning networks.

termsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
termsOfUse.platformDescription:
Strategy Mars is a P2P (peer-to-peer) platform that offers a secure environment for Bitcoin (BTC) trading. Unlike traditional exchanges, we don't have instant transactions. Our P2P model ensures that you trade directly with other users, always with the assurance that transactions will be carried out efficiently and reliably.

All liquidity providers at Strategy Mars make a deposit in BTC, which is held until the transaction is completed, ensuring that both parties fulfill what was agreed.
transactionsSteps: Choose the desired amount, select the network, and provide your wallet address.
Provide a phone number for sending the payment receipt.
Remember to accept the Terms of Use and applicable Fees to continue.
termsOfUse.transactionLimitsDescription: The minimum amount for the first purchase is 500 BRL. The maximum daily amount allowed for transactions is 5,000 BRL. For amounts above this limit, contact support for more information and approval.
termsOfUse.transactionDurationDescription: Transaction processing time can vary between 30 minutes to 24 hours, depending on various factors such as bank processing, sending receipts, and network congestion. If the market fluctuates during trading, additional delays may occur.
termsOfUse.kycPoliciesDescription:
At Strategy Mars, we don't require KYC (Know Your Customer) to conduct transactions, as we believe in the privacy and freedom of our explorers. The responsibility for identity verification lies with the banks that allow the use of bank accounts.

Our role is to ensure that transactions occur efficiently and securely, functioning as a marketplace for the exchange of values between users.
termsOfUse.globalReachDescription1: Operations are conducted globally, offering various payment options.
termsOfUse.globalReachDescription2: Providers operate independently, without specific ties to banks or regulatory entities.
termsOfUse.globalReachDescription3: Using the platform automatically implies full acceptance of the Terms of Use.
termsOfUse.disputesStep1: Open a support request or contact us via WhatsApp.
termsOfUse.disputesStep2: Financial sanctions will be applied in cases of dishonesty.
termsOfUse.disputesStep3: Unfounded disputes will be subject to sanctions of 10% of the order value.
termsOfUse.disputesStep4: The normal resolution time can range from 7 to 30 days, and may extend depending on the banks' analysis time.
termsOfUse.conductDescription1: Our commitment is to maintain a safe and respectful environment for all explorers.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty1: 10%: Defamation without prior attempt at resolution.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty2: 20%: Defamation during the analysis of an arbitration.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty3: 100%: Fraud attempts or trading with illicit funds.
termsOfUse.conductPenalty4: 125%: Bad faith by the provider or failure to send funds to the counterparty after receipt.
termsOfUse.conductDescription2: Explorers with inappropriate behavior will be permanently banned from the colony.
termsOfUse.footer: Thank you for choosing Strategy Mars. Our commitment is to your freedom and privacy.
